meanings.definition: The quality of being indubitable; certainty.
meanings.sent1: The indubitableness of his statement left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent2: The indubitableness of the evidence convinced everyone of his innocence.
meanings.sent3: The indubitableness of her baking skills made her the star of the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The indubitableness of the sunrise brought a sense of peace to the morning.
meanings.sent5: The indubitableness of gravity keeps us firmly planted on the ground.

meanings.definition: The state of being unquestionable or undeniable.
meanings.sent1: The indubitableness of the fact was evident to all who witnessed it.
meanings.sent2: There was an air of indubitableness in her confident demeanor.
meanings.sent3: The indubitableness of his victory in the game was celebrated by all.
meanings.sent4: The indubitableness of the law's authority was unquestioned by the citizens.
meanings.sent5: The indubitableness of her talent shone through in every performance.
